Text.Page:
The time has come to cut out the guts of the gula operation. Take down {@LinkCreature:8#8011#Glauka}, their leader, and show the gulas we're the dominant force in this region.

Be warned, Glauka's a tough bastard. He had to be to get this far. Make sure you come back alive.
That looks...heavy. Next time, I'll ask for a lighter, less cumbersome trophy.
Glauka is in the Cavern of Slaughter. He intimidates me, but you intimidate me even more.
